{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = AC600 WiFi Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.asiarf.com/11ac-WiFi-Router-in-mini-PCIe-form-factor-included-USB-to-Ethernet-AP7620-MPE-1-product-view-399.html |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = AsiaRF_AP7260_MPE-1 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = AsiaRF |model = AP7260 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = MPE-1 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = module |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7620A; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24KEc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 580 <!-- 580 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = EtronTech;EM68B16CWQD-25H; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |lan_ports = <!-- 4 --> |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe, USB 2.0 |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = Mini USB
|serial = yes |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 05/09/2016 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = MediaTek;MT7610E; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 1 |rad2rxchains = 1 |rad2sstreams = 1 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 433 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad2n = 150 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ''Module in Mini PCIe form factor included USB to Ethernet'' :Flash/RAM may vary, defaults are specified as 8MB/64MB
===Features=== *Chipset: [[MediaTek]] MT7620A/MT7610E :(with Ethernet to USB Interface) *Flash 8/16MB, Memory: DDR2 64/128MB *Interface: 1x Mini PCIe, USB 2.0 (pins) *Standard: 802.11abgn/ac, Bandwidth: 20/40/80MHz *Wireless LAN: 1T1R Mode (150+433 Mbps) *Antenna: 1x iPex connector (PIFA opt.) *Multi-mode support: Access Point/Client *Support Multiple SSID, WPS *High security with build-in: WEP 64/128, :TKIP, WPA, WPA2 mix, 802.1x and 802.11i *802.1x Authentication with RADIUS Client
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.cnx-software.com/2016/07/26/asiarf-ap7620-mpe-1-openwrt-wifi-router-mini-pcie-card-is-made-for-computers-and-embedded-systems/ ''AsiaRF AP7260 MPE-1'' on '''CNX-Software'''] :*SoC: [[MediaTek MT7620A]] @580MHz ([[MIPS 24KEc]] CPU) ::with 2T2R Wi-Fi 802.11bgn (but board only supports 1Ã—1) :*WiFI Chipset: [[MediaTek]] MT7610E 802.11ac 1T1R (433 Mbps) :*System Memory: 64/128MB (DDR2), Storage: 8/16MB (SPI flash) :*WiFI features: 802.1x Authentication with RADIUS Client ::Security: 64/128-bit WEP, TKIP, WPA, WPA2, AES; ::Multi-mode support: Access Point/Client, Support Multiple SSID :*Mini PCIe interface with USB2.0 to Eth, UART, 8 GPIO, 1.5/3.3V :*Dimensions: 60x41.5 mm (bigger than standard mini card: 50x30 mm)
[[Category:English Documentation]]
